name: Kids Station: Yancharu Moncha
overview: Kids Station Yancharu Moncha is a collection of educational mini games specially designed for young kids to learn about maths, alphabet and other things. The game features Moncha (a strange but friedly alien) as the main character. The game features mini games like imitation, racing, quiz, etc. Manufacturer's description: In this software, designed for children, Kids Station Yancharu Moncha the player will play with Moncha that is not familiar with numeral, the words, the comparison and conclusion, so the player will help him with them and take him home. Only four big buttons for specific functions. Kids Station controller set included in the package. Learning for young children to play games. Features: •Third person perspective. •2D graphics •Cartoon graphics •SCI-FI, Fantasy & Educational themes.
